content: this crochet shawl pattern uses the moss stitch and the double_crochet stitch a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel youtube channel willow crochet shawl 1 this crochet pattern is written in us terms finished size when laid flat is 30 inches in height x 62 inches wide across the top size can be adjusted by changing the number of times the repeat row in the pattern are done materials needed 870 yards of a #4 medium-weight yarn yarn used 2 skeins of caron blossom cakes in the color tropical blooms 6 00mm j-10 crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/bpipdy0mh_8 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
